request.description: Gets a list of the recipes for a given user's library.
Gets a recipe by its id.

body.raw:
{
    "recipeId": 1,
    "name": "banana bread",
    "isPublic": true,
    "serves": 8,
    "prepTime": "20 mins",
    "cookTime": "30 mins",
    "totalTime": "1 hour",
    "ingredients": "[{\"name\": \"banana\", \"qty\": \"6ea\"}, {\"name\": \"flour\", \"qty\": \"4cups\"}, {\"name\": \"butter\", \"qty\": \"1stick\"}]",
    "utensils": "[\"mixing bowl\", \"mixer\", \"bread pan\"]",
    "instructions": "[\"thaw bananas\", \"mix bananas, butter, and flour\", \"pour in bread pan\", \"bake in oven at 350, for one hour\"]",
    "imgUrl": "https://food.fnr.sndimg.com/content/dam/images/food/fullset/2010/4/13/0/GC_banana-bread_s4x3.jpg.rend.hgtvcom.826.620.suffix/1371592847747.jpeg"
}

{
    "name": "banana bread 2",
    "description": "my mother's recipe, the best!",
    "isPublic": true,
    "rating": 5,
    "serves": 8,
    "prepTime": "",
    "cookTime": "",
    "totalTime": "",
    "ingredients": [
        {
            "ingredientId": 1,
            "name": "banana",
            "qty": 4.0,
            "unit": "ea"
        }
    ],
    "utensils": [
        "mixing bowl",
        "mixer",
        "bread pan",
        "oven"
    ],
    "instructions": [
        "this is it",
        "number 2",
        "thaw bananas",
        "mix all ingredients together",
        "pour in bread pan",
        "bake in oven at 350F",
        "check every half-hour"
    ],
    "imgUrl": "https://food.fnr.sndimg.com/content/dam/images/food/fullset/2010/4/13/0/GC_banana-bread_s4x3.jpg.rend.hgtvcom.826.620.suffix/1371592847747.jpeg",
    "submittedBy": "zach",
    "categories": [
        {
            "categoryId": 1,
            "name": "quick bread"
        },
        {
            "categoryId": 2,
            "name": "breakfast"
        }
    ]
}

request.description: Returns a meal for a given meal_id.
Get all the meals for a given user.

body.raw:
{
    "planId": 4,
    "userId": 1,
    "name": "a meal for a postman",
    "meals": [
        {
            "mealId": 1,
            "name": "breakfast of champions",
            "userId": 1,
            "recipeList": [
                {
                    "recipeId": 3,
                    "name": "egg on a croissant",
                    "description": "A nice simple meal!",
                    "isPublic": true,
                    "rating": 5,
                    "serves": 2,
                    "prepTime": "",
                    "cookTime": "",
                    "totalTime": "",
                    "ingredients": [
                        {
                            "ingredientId": 25,
                            "name": "croissant",
                            "qty": 3.0,
                            "unit": "ea"
                        },
                        {
                            "ingredientId": 5,
                            "name": "eggs",
                            "qty": 6.0,
                            "unit": "ea"
                        }
                    ],
                    "utensils": "{utensils: [\"skillet\", \"oven\", \"plates\"]}",
                    "instructions": "{instructions: [\"butter the croissants and put them in the oven to melt the butter\",\r\n\t\"fry an egg in the skillet till done the way you like\", \"put the egg on the croissant\",\r\n\t\"enjoy\"]}",
                    "imgUrl": "https://www.thehopelesshousewife.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/05/Croissant-Eggs-Benedict2.jpg",
                    "submittedBy": "1"
                }
            ],
            "mealDay": "monday",
            "mealTime": "breakfast"
        },
        {
            "mealId": 2,
            "name": "just another lunch, out in the park",
            "userId": 1,
            "recipeList": [
                {
                    "recipeId": 1,
                    "name": "banana bread",
                    "description": "my mother's recipe, the best!",
                    "isPublic": true,
                    "rating": 5,
                    "serves": 8,
                    "prepTime": "",
                    "cookTime": "",
                    "totalTime": "",
                    "ingredients": [
                        {
                            "ingredientId": 11,
                            "name": "baking soda",
                            "qty": 1.0,
                            "unit": "tsp"
                        },
                        {
                            "ingredientId": 1,
                            "name": "banana",
                            "qty": 4.0,
                            "unit": "ea"
                        },
                        {
                            "ingredientId": 7,
                            "name": "chia seeds",
                            "qty": 2.0,
                            "unit": "tbs"
                        },
                        {
                            "ingredientId": 10,
                            "name": "coconut oil",
                            "qty": 3.0,
                            "unit": "tbs"
                        },
                        {
                            "ingredientId": 2,
                            "name": "flour",
                            "qty": 1.5,
                            "unit": "cups"
                        },
                        {
                            "ingredientId": 13,
                            "name": "mandarin oranges",
                            "qty": 1.0,
                            "unit": "cups"
                        },
                        {
                            "ingredientId": 8,
                            "name": "maraschino cherries",
                            "qty": 1.0,
                            "unit": "cups"
                        },
                        {
                            "ingredientId": 19,
                            "name": "salt",
                            "qty": 1.0,
                            "unit": "tsp"
                        },
                        {
                            "ingredientId": 14,
                            "name": "semi-sweet chocolate chips",
                            "qty": 1.0,
                            "unit": "cups"
                        },
                        {
                            "ingredientId": 9,
                            "name": "sugar",
                            "qty": 0.75,
                            "unit": "cups"
                        }
                    ],
                    "utensils": "{utensils: [\"mixing bowl\", \"mixer\", \"bread pan\", \"oven\"]}",
                    "instructions": "{instructions: [\"thaw bananas\", \"mix all ingredients together\", \"pour in bread pan\", \"bake in oven at 350F, check every half-hour\"]}",
                    "imgUrl": "https://food.fnr.sndimg.com/content/dam/images/food/fullset/2010/4/13/0/GC_banana-bread_s4x3.jpg.rend.hgtvcom.826.620.suffix/1371592847747.jpeg",
                    "submittedBy": "1"
                }
            ],
            "mealDay": "friday",
            "mealTime": "lunch"
        },
        {
            "mealId": 5,
            "name": "bananas for breakfast",
            "userId": 1,
            "recipeList": [
                {
                    "recipeId": 7,
                    "name": "bananas in cereal",
                    "description": "a way to add bananas to breakfast!",
                    "isPublic": true,
                    "rating": 5,
                    "serves": 2,
                    "prepTime": "",

                        }
                    ],

                    "instructions": "{instructions: [\"cut up the bananas into slices\",\r\n\t\"put banana slices along with cereal and milk into a bowl\",\r\n\t\"enjoy\"]}",
                    "imgUrl": "https://i0.wp.com/www.theimpulsivebuy.com/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2018/06/Kelloggs-Raisin-Bran-with-Bananas-2.jpg?resize=550%2C550&ssl=1",
                    "submittedBy": "1"
                }
            ],
            "mealDay": "friday",
            "mealTime": "breakfast"
        }
